img.alt: Breakfast and Lunch Pick Up

div.p: We are now serving breakfast and lunch on Mondays from 10:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. at the Hudson Middle School.

a.title: Go to comments for Breakfast and Lunch Pick Up

img.alt: Shoe Collection Supports Student Assistance Fund/Micro-entreprenaurs!

a.span: Shoe Collection Supports Student Assistance Fund/Micro-entreprenaurs!

div.p: Service Learning Shoe Collection ends March 20th. Collection bins are located in the main office of each school.

a.title: Go to comments for Shoe Collection Supports Student Assistance Fund/Micro-entreprenaurs!

img.alt: Kindergarten Registration

div.p: It's as easy as 1-2-3!

a.title: Go to comments for Kindergarten Registration for 2020-2021 Now Available

img.alt: Kiwanis presents grant check to Superintendent and HHS staff and students.

a.span: Kiwanis Club of Hudson Grants $20,000 to Start Hydroponic Garden

div.p: The Kiwanis Club of Hudson once again has demonstrated its commitment to the development of our youth in the Hudson Schools.

a.title: Go to comments for Kiwanis Club of Hudson Grants $20,000 to Start Hydroponic Garden

img.alt: Drone image of HMS progress on new building

a.span: View the Middle School Construction As It Happens!

div.p: Watch the site in real time for the duration of the Middle School Construction!

a.title: Go to comments for View the Middle School Construction As It Happens!

img.alt: Preschooler sign construction beam1

a.span: Ellsworth Hill students sign steel beams for new Addition!

a.title: Go to comments for Ellsworth Hill students sign steel beams for new Addition!

img.alt: Beaming being lifted into place at the new Middle School.

div.p: The last steel signature beam (signed by students and staff) has been hoisted into place at the new Middle School. Referred to as The Beam Topping Off Ceremony, it is the placing of the last beam and is a major milestone. The beam is typically adorned with a small evergreen tree and an American flag. The custom celebrates the construction process and is viewed as the first introduction of the building to the public.

a.title: Go to comments for Beam Topping Off Ceremony!

img.alt: Photo of students signing a beam for the new Middle School.

a.span: HMS Beam-Signing to Honor Students and Staff!

div.p: Every Hudson Middle School student and staff member will become part of history by signing their name to one of three large steel beams that will be placed in the new Middle School. To organize the event, each student signed the beam during their Social Studies class on August 26, 27, or 28th.

a.title: Go to comments for HMS Beam-Signing to Honor Students and Staff!

img.alt: Screen capture of Hudson City Schools website homepage

div.p: We are pleased to announce that the Hudson City School District has launched a new website! To help understand the reconstruction and where to find important back-to-school information, please view the "Welcome to the New Website" tutorial.

a.title: Go to comments for Welcome to the New Website!

img.alt: Free and Reduced Meals Application for 2019-2020

a.span: Free and Reduced Meals Application for 2019-2020

a.title: Go to comments for Free and Reduced Meals Application for 2019-2020

img.alt: Phillip Butto Hired as District Treasurer/CFO

a.span: Phillip Butto Hired as District Treasurer/CFO

div.p: The Board of Education has approved the hiring of the next Treasurer/Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of the Hudson City School District. Phillip Butto will replace Kathryn Sines, who is retiring as of July 31, 2019 after an outstanding 26-year career as a school financial officer.

a.title: Go to comments for Phillip Butto Hired as District Treasurer/CFO

img.alt: 4.27.20 Superintendent Phil Herman's Monday Video Message

a.span: 4.27.20 Superintendent Phil Herman's Monday Video Message

div.p: Superintendent Phil Herman updates information about the closing of schools for the rest of the year, how to find help, and talks about a parent survey coming to you soon!

a.title: Go to comments for 4.27.20 Superintendent Phil Herman's Monday Video Message
